content.raw: I think this started failing after we started using single-precision for bullet on OS X. Currently, this test appears to fail [all the time on gazebo7](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_Pioneer2dx/StraightLine_1/history/) but only [occasionally on gazebo8](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-homebrew-amd64/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_Pioneer2dx/StraightLine_1/history/) and [occasionally on default](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/junit/(root)/PhysicsEngines_Pioneer2dx/StraightLine_1/history/).
content.html: I think this started failing after we started using single-precision for bullet on OS X. Currently, this test appears to fail all the time on gazebo7 but only occasionally on gazebo8 and occasionally on default.
